statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:APIGateway) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:APIGateway) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:APIGatewayStage)<-[:HAS_STAGE]-(:APIGateway) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:APIGatewayStage)<-[r:HAS_STAGE]-(:APIGateway) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:APIGatewayStage)-[r:HAS_APIGATEWAY_INTEGRATION]->(n) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
